head.title: Home - Leicester Public Schools

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.div: Recognized by the community as its greatest asset, the Leicester Schools engage every child in rigorous, student-centered learning in a safe and technology-rich environment.

3 Washburn Square, 3rd Floor, Leicester, MA 01524
Phone 508-892-7040 | Fax 508-892-7063

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

background-color: rgb(255, 0, 0);
text-align: center; font-family: "MS Sans Serif"; font-size: 32px;

strong.span: Leicester Public Schools will be closed

span.style: text-align: center; font-family: "MS Sans Serif"; font-size: 32px;
font-size: 32px; color: rgb(99, 0, 0);

strong.span: for the remainder of the school year.

span.style: text-align: center; font-family: "MS Sans Serif"; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-size: 16px;

span.span: For more information on Covid-19, and the school closures please click here.
